summary: This document is an email correspondence regarding a meeting agenda related to Jeffrey Epstein. It includes communications between Caroline Kitidis and Paul Morris, discussing meeting logistics and preparations. The document highlights the internal planning and coordination among Deutsche Bank employees.

persons.name: Caroline V. Kitidis
persons.context: Caroline Kitidis is involved in coordinating a meeting agenda and is responsible for preparing documents for the meeting.

persons.name: Paul Morris
persons.context: Paul Morris is coordinating with Caroline Kitidis regarding the meeting agenda and logistics.

persons.name: Monica Gilkinson
persons.context: Monica Gilkinson is mentioned as someone who needs to prepare a professional version of the meeting agenda.

persons.name: Tazia Smith
persons.context: Tazia Smith is included in the email chain regarding the meeting agenda.

connections.description: Both are Managing Directors at Deutsche Bank, collaborating on meeting preparations.

keyFacts: The email correspondence is dated October 22, 2013.
Caroline Kitidis is the Managing Director and Head of Key Client Partners at Deutsche Bank.
Paul Morris is also a Managing Director at Deutsche Bank.
Monica Gilkinson is tasked with preparing a professional version of the meeting agenda.
The document is classified as confidential.
